subject: Plus x pedals
description_text:
Hello there I have reserved the pedals for you but no power supply for the
vibration auxiliary module...can you please help me figure something out?

conversations.body_text: Hi pedro simoes,  If you did not purchase the vibration feedback motors, no additional 24V power supply is required when using the pedals alone. Simply connect the USB data cable to a USB 3.0 port and it will work normally.

Thanks for getting back to me.
I did buy the vibration feedback motors with the pedals and on the website
it said if purchasing pedals and vibration feedback in a bundle you don't
need to buy power supply separately it will come with it.




On Thu, Jan 8, 2026, 8:10 p.m. service@simsonn.com

Hi pedro simoes,     I can see that you purchased only a single VAM Pro, which does not include a power supply. This product requires a package with a power supply to operate properly. You currently have two options:    Purchase a power supply from us separately, or    Buy a local 24V / 3A DC power supply with a 2.5 mm connector, which will also work.

O ok my mistake then..well thanks for your time I appreciate it
